summary: Encapsulates a file-based data source for offline feature stores, managing its location, format, schema and providing utilities for filesystem creation, path handling, type conversion, validation and protobuf serialization.
business_intent: Enables data engineers to define, validate and serialize file inputs (e.g., CSV, Parquet) that Dask or DuckDB offline stores can consume to supply feature data for machineâ€‘learning pipelines.
